ESRS reference
ESRS G1-5 paragraph 29 (b)
Key terms
Political contributions, beneficiary
Background
ESRS G1-5 paragraph 29 states the following: ‘The disclosure required by paragraph 27 shall
include … (b) for financial or in-kind political contributions: (i) the total monetary value of financial
